title: Configure Liquid Clustering
description: Fill in the blanks to create a Delta table with liquid clustering, which provides adaptive data layout without traditional partitioning.
hints: CLUSTER BY specifies columns for liquid clustering
Liquid clustering replaces both PARTITIONED BY and ZORDER BY
You can cluster on high-cardinality columns unlike partitioning
optimalSolution:
CREATE TABLE events (
  event_id BIGINT,
  user_id STRING,
  event_type STRING,
  event_timestamp TIMESTAMP
)
CLUSTER BY (user_id, event_type)
explanation: Liquid clustering is a modern alternative to partitioning that automatically organizes data based on specified columns. Unlike partitioning, you can change clustering columns without rewriting data, and it handles high-cardinality columns efficiently. Use OPTIMIZE to apply clustering incrementally.
